name.zh_CN: Save To PhotoPrism® - 一键保存图片到 PhotoPrism®

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With the Save To PhotoPrism extension, a simple right-click on the image allows you to swiftly save it to your PhotoPrism service.
short.zh_CN: 在浏览网页时遇到喜欢的图片？使用 Save To PhotoPrism 插件，只需右键点击图片即可快速保存到您的 PhotoPrism 服务中。优化您的使用体验，实现高效、便捷的图片管理！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While browsing the web, have you come across images that captivate you? With the Save To PhotoPrism extension, a simple
right-click on the image allows you to swiftly save it to your PhotoPrism service. Enhance your user experience and
achieve efficient, convenient image management!
long.zh_CN: 在浏览网页时遇到喜欢的图片？使用 Save To PhotoPrism 插件，只需右键点击图片即可快速保存到您的 PhotoPrism 服务中。优化您的使用体验，实现高效、便捷的图片管理！
